plot outline: Noorondu Bagilu is a 2011 Indian Kannada film, directed by Vemagal Jagannath Rao and Produced by Y N Amrutha. The film stars Kiran, Thilak Raj, Bianca Desai, Sandeep, Deeksha, Ashwini and Sihikahi Chandru in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by V Manohar.
title: Noorondu Bagilu
plot: _Noorondu Bagilu_ (qv) is a 2011 Indian Kannada film, directed by Vemagal Jagannath Rao and Produced by Y N Amrutha. The film stars Kiran, Thilak Raj, Bianca Desai, Sandeep, Deeksha, Ashwini and Sihikahi Chandru in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by V Manohar.
